Name.BusinessNameLine1: Universidad Interamericana de Puerto Rico Inc

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: The Universidad Interamericana de Puerto Rico, Inc. is a higher education institution pursuing quality, academic excellence with emphasis in the formation of people with high standards, ethical and democratically values.
IRS990.Description: During the 2009-10 fiscal year, Universidad Interamericana de Puerto Rico, Inc. provided educational services for over 45 thousand students on its eleven campus. Over six thousand educational degrees were granted in several fields of studies ranging from Aasociates up to Doctoral degrees, Optometry degree and Law degrees.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: External auditors have evaluated the amounts relating to this area, and determined not to include a footnote due to its inmaterial figures.
Part XI. Line 8 - Other Adjustments Student's scholarships.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: As required by federal and state laws the Universidad Interamericana de Puerto Rico includes in most of the documentation its nondiscriminatory policies and statements.
IRS990ScheduleE.GovtFinancialAidExplanation: The University receives annually several scholarships, awards, grants and financial aid from federal and state agencies to assist students in their academic goals.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: Financial aid assistance are awarded based on US Federal, State and Private guidelines as required by the type of assistance.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: One executive/ officer received housing allowance as part of her compensation.
There were 106 participants in the ING plan, FY 2010 contributions were $633,672, withdrawals amounted to $134,384 and fee charges amounted to $1,410.

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: Bonds issued for new educational buildings
Bonds issued for new educational buildings

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The UBT was in Puerto Rico, the subsidiary filed a Puerto Rico corporate tax return for its operations.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Universidad Interamericana de Puerto Rico has a Board of Trustees that meet monthly to oversee and monitor all business aspects of the organization.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Trustees has an internal procedure to evaluate, nominate, and vote for the directive positions.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Trustees meet monthly, Management must consult with the Board and seek approval to those major issues that affect the operations of the University.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A printed copy of the 990 return is presented to the Board of Trustees prior formal filing to the IRS. The return is compiled and calculated based upon audited financial statements and supplemental information gathered from the University's internal reporting and system.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Inter American University has a written policy and a self assessment questionnaire to monitor conflict of interest among key personnel, board of trustees and other related to the Institution, which is done annually.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Human Resources Office compiles market data, trends, and other information to assess the personnel's compensation. In addition, for some positions there are committee being assign to review and evaluate prospective personnel.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Universidad Interamericana makes it governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Responsibility for Oversight of External Audit
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Universidad Interamericana maintains a Board of Trustees Auditing Committee that hires, and review processes with the external auditors.
